EMR-PL-34.sql: select * from ( select a.ENTER_DATE_TIME,ORDER_DOCTOR_ID,ORDER_DOCTOR_NAME,APPLY_DEPT_ID,APPLY_DEPT_NAME,CHECK_DATE_TIME,CHECK_OPERA_ID,CHECK_OPERA_NAME,PLACER_ORDER_NO,lx.master_member_code ORDER_CATEGORY_CODE,lx.master_member_name ORDER_CATEGORY_NAME,ORDER_ITEM_NAME,CANCEL_DATE_TIME,pc.master_member_code DRUG_FREQ_CODE, pc.master_member_name DRUG_FREQ_NAME,tj.master_member_code USAGE_CODE,tj.master_member_name USAGE_NAME,DOSE_UNIT_NAME,REGEXP_REPLACE(DOSE,'[^0-9,^.]+','') DOSE,USE_UNIT_NAME,DRUG_TOTAL_DOSE,TRUNC(EXEC_DAYS) EXEC_DAYS,jx.master_member_code DRUG_FORM_CODE,EXEC_DEPT_ID,EXEC_DEPT_NAME,to_char(ORDER_GROUP_NO) ORDER_GROUP_NO,TO_CHAR(USE_QUANTITY,'FM990.00') USE_QUANTITY,jx.master_member_name DRUG_FORM_NAME,FILL_DATE_TIME ORDER_START_DATE_TIME,FILL_DATE_TIME ORDER_END_DATE_TIME,ORDER_ENTRUST,VISIT_NO,VISIT_ID,ENCOUNTER_TYPE_CODE,ENCOUNTER_TYPE_NAME,PATIENT_ID,OUTPATIENT,INPATIENT,PATIENT_NAME,GENDER_CODE,GENDER_NAME,DATE_OF_BIRTH,DEPT_ID,DEPT_NAME,'' WARD_ID,'' WARD_NAME,'9' ORDER_TYPE_CODE,'其他' ORDER_TYPE_NAME   from DEVELOPER_JCPT.VI_JCPT_OUTPA_ADVICE_CANCEL a   LEFT JOIN JCPT_MASTER_DATA_MAPPING pc on pc.master_definition_code = 'M07002' and pc.dict_member_code = DRUG_FREQ_CODE   LEFT JOIN JCPT_MASTER_DATA_MAPPING tj on tj.master_definition_code = 'M07003' and tj.dict_member_code = USAGE_CODE   LEFT JOIN JCPT_MASTER_DATA_MAPPING jx on jx.master_definition_code = 'M14004' and jx.dict_member_code = DRUG_FORM_CODE   LEFT JOIN JCPT_MASTER_DATA_MAPPING lx on lx.master_definition_code = 'M07001' and lx.dict_member_code = ORDER_CATEGORY_CODE   where DOSE NOT LIKE '%:%' AND DOSE NOT LIKE '%*%' union all select b.ENTER_DATE_TIME,ORDER_DOCTOR_ID,ORDER_DOCTOR_NAME,APPLY_DEPT_ID,APPLY_DEPT_NAME,CHECK_DATE_TIME,CHECK_OPERA_ID,CHECK_OPERA_NAME,PLACER_ORDER_NO,lx.master_member_code ORDER_CATEGORY_CODE,lx.master_member_name ORDER_CATEGORY_NAME,ORDER_ITEM_NAME,CANCEL_DATE_TIME,pc.master_member_code DRUG_FREQ_CODE, pc.master_member_name DRUG_FREQ_NAME,tj.master_member_code USAGE_CODE,tj.master_member_name USAGE_NAME,DOSE_UNIT_NAME,REGEXP_REPLACE(DOSE,'[^0-9,^.]+','') DOSE,USE_UNIT_NAME,DRUG_TOTAL_DOSE,TRUNC(EXEC_DAYS) EXEC_DAYS,jx.master_member_code DRUG_FORM_CODE,EXEC_DEPT_ID,EXEC_DEPT_NAME,to_char(ORDER_GROUP_NO) ORDER_GROUP_NO,TO_CHAR(USE_QUANTITY,'FM990.00') USE_QUANTITY,jx.master_member_name DRUG_FORM_NAME,ORDER_START_DATE_TIME,ORDER_END_DATE_TIME,ORDER_ENTRUST,VISIT_NO,VISIT_ID,ENCOUNTER_TYPE_CODE,ENCOUNTER_TYPE_NAME,PATIENT_ID,OUTPATIENT,INPATIENT,PATIENT_NAME,GENDER_CODE,GENDER_NAME,DATE_OF_BIRTH,DEPT_ID,DEPT_NAME,to_char(WARD_ID) WARD_ID,WARD_NAME,case when ORDER_TYPE_CODE = 1 then '1' when ORDER_TYPE_CODE = 2 then '2' else '9' end ORDER_TYPE_CODE, case when ORDER_TYPE_CODE = 1 then '长期医嘱' when ORDER_TYPE_CODE = 2 then '临时医嘱' else ' 其他' end ORDER_TYPE_NAME   from DEVELOPER_JCPT.VI_JCPT_ZY_ALL_CONFIRM b   LEFT JOIN JCPT_MASTER_DATA_MAPPING pc on pc.master_definition_code = 'M07002' and pc.dict_member_code = DRUG_FREQ_CODE   LEFT JOIN JCPT_MASTER_DATA_MAPPING tj on tj.master_definition_code = 'M07003' and tj.dict_member_code = USAGE_CODE   LEFT JOIN JCPT_MASTER_DATA_MAPPING jx on jx.master_definition_code = 'M14004' and jx.dict_member_code = DRUG_FORM_CODE    LEFT JOIN JCPT_MASTER_DATA_MAPPING lx on lx.master_definition_code = 'M07001' and lx.dict_member_code = ORDER_CATEGORY_CODE    where DOSE NOT LIKE '%:%' AND DOSE NOT LIKE '%*%'      ) t left join DEVELOPER_JCPT.VI_JCPT_PATIENT_INFORMATION p on p.PATIENT_ID = t.patient_id 	 WHERE PLACER_ORDER_NO = /QUMT_IN020030UV01/controlActProcess/queryByParameter/queryByParameterPayload/actId/value/item/@extension   order by t.ENTER_DATE_TIME desc

VISIT_ID, VISIT_NO, PATIENT_NAME, PATIENT_ID, INPATIENT, OUTPATIENT, MED_RECORD_NO, GENDER_CODE, GENDER_NAME, DATE_OF_BIRTH, AGE_YEAR, AGE_MONTH, AGE_DAY, to_char(AGE_HOUR) AGE_HOUR, VISIT_DATE_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, WARD_ID, WARD_NAME, BED_NO, EXAM_REG_CODE, EXAM_APPLY_ID, EXAM_APPLY_NO, PLACER_ORDER_NO, APPLY_DATE_TIME, APPLY_DEPT_ID, APPLY_DEPT_NAME, APPLY_DOCTOR_ID, APPLY_DOCTOR_NAME, DISEASE_DESC, PRESENT_HISTORY_DESC, ''DIAG_DATE_TIME, f.ICD10 DIAG_CODE,f.ICD10MC  DIAG_NAME, DIAG_DESC, APPLY_PURPOSE_DESC, EXAM_CATEGORY_CODE, EXAM_CATEGORY_NAME, EXAM_CLASS_CODE, EXAM_CLASS_NAME, UNIVERSAL_SERVICE_CODE, UNIVERSAL_SERVICE_NAME, EXAM_PART_CODE, EXAM_PART_NAME, APPLY_CMMT, SCHEDULE_START_DATE_TIME, SCHEDULE_END_DATE_TIME, REGISTRANT_DATE_TIME, REGISTRANT_OPERA_ID, REGISTRANT_OPERA_NAME, CANCEL_FLAG, CANCEL_DATE_TIME, CANCEL_REASON_DESC, CANCEL_OPERA_ID, CANCEL_OPERA_NAME, EXEC_ORG_CODE, EXEC_ORG_NAME, EXEC_SYSTEM_CODE, EXEC_SYSTEM_NAME, TO_CHAR(EXEC_DEPT_ID) EXEC_DEPT_ID, EXEC_DEPT_NAME, EMER_FLAG, GREEN_CHANNEL_FLAG, FEE_AMOUNT, APPLY_STATUS_CODE, APPLY_STATUS_NAME, GESTATION_WEEK, GESTATION_DAY, LAST_MENSTRUAL_PERIOD, FEE_STATUS_CODE, FEE_STATUS_NAME  FROM DEVELOPER_JCPT.VI_JCPT_OUTPA_EXAM_APPLY a left join DEVELOPER_JCPT.VI_ZD_ICD10 f on f.icd= a.DIAG_CODE where EXAM_APPLY_NO = /QUMT_IN020030UV01/controlActProcess/queryByParameter/queryByParameterPayload/actId/value/item[1]/@extension 	and APPLY_STATUS_NAME IN ('等待预约', '暂停预约','已预约','报告完成')     and APPLY_DATE_TIME > '20200401T000000' union all SELECT row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY EXAM_APPLY_NO ORDER BY EXAM_APPLY_ID) no_num,EMPI_ID, PK_PATIENT, ENCOUNTER_ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, ENCOUNTER_TYPE_CODE, ENCOUNTER_TYPE_NAME, VISIT_ID, VISIT_NO, PATIENT_NAME, PATIENT_ID, INPATIENT, OUTPATIENT, MED_RECORD_NO, GENDER_CODE, GENDER_NAME, DATE_OF_BIRTH, AGE_YEAR, AGE_MONTH, AGE_DAY, to_char(AGE_HOUR) AGE_HOUR, VISIT_DATE_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, WARD_ID, WARD_NAME, BED_NO, EXAM_REG_CODE, EXAM_APPLY_ID, EXAM_APPLY_NO, PLACER_ORDER_NO, APPLY_DATE_TIME, APPLY_DEPT_ID, APPLY_DEPT_NAME, APPLY_DOCTOR_ID, APPLY_DOCTOR_NAME, DISEASE_DESC, PRESENT_HISTORY_DESC, ''DIAG_DATE_TIME, f.ICD10 DIAG_CODE,f.ICD10MC  DIAG_NAME, DIAG_DESC, APPLY_PURPOSE_DESC, EXAM_CATEGORY_CODE, EXAM_CATEGORY_NAME, EXAM_CLASS_CODE, EXAM_CLASS_NAME, UNIVERSAL_SERVICE_CODE, UNIVERSAL_SERVICE_NAME, EXAM_PART_CODE, EXAM_PART_NAME, APPLY_CMMT, SCHEDULE_START_DATE_TIME, SCHEDULE_END_DATE_TIME, REGISTRANT_DATE_TIME, REGISTRANT_OPERA_ID, REGISTRANT_OPERA_NAME, CANCEL_FLAG, CANCEL_DATE_TIME, CANCEL_REASON_DESC, CANCEL_OPERA_ID, CANCEL_OPERA_NAME, EXEC_ORG_CODE, EXEC_ORG_NAME, EXEC_SYSTEM_CODE, EXEC_SYSTEM_NAME, TO_CHAR(EXEC_DEPT_ID) EXEC_DEPT_ID, EXEC_DEPT_NAME, EMER_FLAG, GREEN_CHANNEL_FLAG, FEE_AMOUNT, APPLY_STATUS_CODE, APPLY_STATUS_NAME, GESTATION_WEEK, GESTATION_DAY, LAST_MENSTRUAL_PERIOD, FEE_STATUS_CODE, FEE_STATUS_NAME  FROM DEVELOPER_JCPT.VI_JCPT_SPECIAL_APPLAY_CONFIRM a left join DEVELOPER_JCPT.VI_ZD_ICD10 f on f.icd= a.DIAG_CODE where EXAM_APPLY_NO = /QUMT_IN020030UV01/controlActProcess/queryByParameter/queryByParameterPayload/actId/value/item[1]/@extension	and APPLY_STATUS_NAME IN ('等待预约', '暂停预约','已预约','报告完成')     and APPLY_DATE_TIME > '20200401T000000'

biopsy_site_code, biopsy_site_name, clinic_exam_desc, surgery_date_time,surgery_code, surgery_name, fixative_date_time, fixative_opera_id, fixative_opera_name, fixative_code, fixative_name, specimen_type_code, specimen_type_name, specimen_no, collect_method_code, collect_method_name, collect_date_time, collect_dept_id, collect_dept_name, collect_opera_id, collect_opera_name, gestation_day, last_menstrual_period, fee_status_code, fee_status_name ,null exam_apply_no from developer_jcpt.VI_JCPT_OUTPATIENT_PATHOLOGY a left join DEVELOPER_JCPT.VI_ZD_ICD10 f on f.JBID= a.DIAG_CODE  union all select row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY PATHOLOGY_APPLY_NO ORDER BY PATHOLOGY_APPLY_ID) no_num,PATHOLOGY_APPLY_NO  ,empi_id, pk_patient, encounter_id, org_code, org_name, encounter_type_code, encounter_type_name, visit_id, visit_no, patient_name, patient_id, inpatient, outpatient, med_record_no, gender_code, gender_name, date_of_birth, age_year, age_month, age_day, age_hour, visit_date_time, dept_id, dept_name, ward_id, ward_name, bed_no, pathology_reg_code, pathology_apply_id, pathology_apply_no as apply_no, placer_order_no, apply_date_time, apply_dept_id, apply_dept_name, apply_doctor_id, apply_doctor_name, disease_desc, present_history_desc, diag_date_time,f.ICD10 diag_code,f.ICD10MC diag_name, diag_desc, apply_purpose_desc, pathology_category_code, pathology_category_name, pathology_class_code, pathology_class_name, universal_service_code, universal_service_name, to_char(pathology_part_code) pathology_part_code, pathology_part_name, biopsy_site_code, biopsy_site_name, clinic_exam_desc, surgery_date_time, surgery_code, surgery_name, fixative_date_time, fixative_opera_id, fixative_opera_name, fixative_code, fixative_name, specimen_type_code, specimen_type_name, specimen_no, collect_method_code, collect_method_name, collect_date_time, collect_dept_id, collect_dept_name, collect_opera_id, collect_opera_name, delivery_date_time, delivery_opera_id, delivery_opera_name, receive_date_time, receive_opera_id, receive_opera_name, apply_cmmt, cancel_flag, cancel_date_time, cancel_reason_desc, cancel_opera_id, gestation_day, last_menstrual_period, fee_status_code, fee_status_name,exam_apply_no  from developer_jcpt.VI_JCPT_PATHOLOGY_APPLY a left join DEVELOPER_JCPT.VI_ZD_ICD10 f on f.JBID= a.DIAG_CODE ) t where PATHOLOGY_CATEGORY_CODE = '0203' and PATHOLOGY_APPLY_NO = /*/controlActProcess/queryByParameter/queryByParameterPayload/actId/value/item/@extension and APPLY_DATE_TIME > '20200401T000000'

EMR-PL-49.sql: select * from (SELECT EMPI_ID,PK_PATIENT,ENCOUNTER_ID,v.ORG_CODE,v.ORG_NAME,ENCOUNTER_TYPE_CODE,ENCOUNTER_TYPE_NAME,VISIT_ID,VISIT_NO,PATIENT_NAME,PATIENT_ID,INPATIENT,MED_RECORD_NO,GENDER_CODE,GENDER_NAME,DATE_OF_BIRTH,AGE_YEAR,AGE_MONTH,AGE_DAY,AGE_HOUR,VISIT_DATE_TIME,DEPT_ID,DEPT_NAME,WARD_ID,WARD_NAME,BED_NO,SURGERY_APPLY_ID,SURGERY_APPLY_NO,PLACER_ORDER_NO,APPLY_DATE_TIME,APPLY_DEPT_ID,APPLY_DEPT_NAME,APPLY_DOCTOR_ID,APPLY_DOCTOR_NAME,f.ICD10 DIAG_CODE_BEFORE_SURGERY,replace(f.ICD10MC,'*','†') DIAG_NAME_BEFORE_SURGERY,DIAG_DESC_BEFORE_SURGERY,SURGERY_GRADE_CODE,SURGERY_GRADE_NAME,SURGERY_CODE,SURGERY_NAME,SURGERY_DESC,REMARK,case when mz.master_member_code is null then '9' else mz.master_member_code end ANESTH_METHOD_CODE,case when mz.master_member_code is null then '其他麻醉方法' else mz.master_member_name end  ANESTH_METHOD_NAME,INCISION_CLASS_CODE,INCISION_CLASS_NAME,SURGERY_PART_CODE,SURGERY_PART_NAME,SURGERY_POSITION_CODE,SURGERY_POSITION_NAME,SCHEDULE_START_DATE_TIME,SCHEDULE_END_DATE_TIME,ROOM_CODE,ROOM_NAME,EC_DEPT_ID,EC_DEPT_NAME,SURGERY_SEQ_NO,SURGERY_ROOM_NO,SURGERY_USE_DESC,SURGEON_ID,SURGEON_NAME,ASSISTANT_FIRST_ID,ASSISTANT_FIRST_NAME,ASSISTANT_SECOND_ID,ASSISTANT_SECOND_NAME,ASSISTANT_THIRD_ID,ASSISTANT_THIRD_NAME,ASSISTANT_FOURTH_ID,ASSISTANT_FOURTH_NAME,ANESTHETIST_ID,ANESTHETIST_NAME,HAND_WASHING_NURSE_ID,HAND_WASHING_NURSE_NAME,TOUR_NURSE_ID,TOUR_NURSE_NAME,CANCEL_FLAG,CANCEL_DATE_TIME,CANCEL_REASON_DESC,CANCEL_OPERA_ID,CANCEL_OPERA_NAME,EXEC_DEPT_ID,EXEC_DEPT_NAME,PRIMARY_SURGERY_FLAG,EMER_FLAG,ISOLATION_FLAG,APPLY_STATUS_CODE,APPLY_STATUS_NAME,INFECTION_HISTORY,IS_SECOND,SECOND_REASON  FROM developer_jcpt.vi_jcpt_surgery_apply  v left join DEVELOPER_JCPT.VI_ZD_ICD10 f on v.DIAG_CODE_BEFORE_SURGERY = f.JBID  left join jcpt_master_data_mapping mz on mz.master_definition_code= 'M11002' and ANESTH_METHOD_NAME = mz.master_member_name   where SURGERY_APPLY_NO = /QUMT_IN020030UV01/controlActProcess/queryByParameter/queryByParameterPayload/actId/value/item/@extension	 order by APPLY_DATE_TIME desc ) 	 where rownum <2
